Name: Goblins
About the game: Goblins is a goofy strategy action game. You command the Emerald Goblin Army, attempting to avenge and defeat the Ruby Goblin Army winning the Great Gold War. Recruit special classes such as: Mages, Bombers, Barbarians, Necromancers and more. Call for precise artillery strikes to cause maximum destruction. Battle through 20 unique Campaign maps and continue your progress in Freeplay and Sandbox game modes.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Goblins? Check out the release date (Mar 17, 2023), developer insights from Neon Wizard Games, and a complete game summary.
